tasks.task: Enter a tractor and start it.
subtasks: Walk to the tractor.
Open tractor door.
Sit in the driver's seat.
Turn the key to start the engine.

tasks.task: Drive the tractor forward onto a field.
subtasks: Press the accelerator pedal.
Activate the steering wheel to move forward.

tasks.task: Operate the loader to lift hay bales.
subtasks: Reach out to the loader controls.
Use the joystick to lift the loader arms.
Lift the forks to pick up a hay bale.
Lower the fork tines to place the bale onto the forks.

tasks.task: Transport hay bales to a storage area.
subtasks: Drive the tractor towards the storage area.
Align the tractor with the storage location.
Descend the forks with the bale to place it on the ground.

tasks.task: Return to the field to continue operations.
subtasks: Reverse the tractor back towards the field.
Raise the fork tines to release the bale.
Adjust the forks to an upright position.

tasks.task: Cut the hay using a mower.
subtasks: Align the mower blade with the crop rows.
Engage the clutch to start cutting.
Guide the tractor slowly over the rows to cut the hay.

tasks.task: Load hay onto the truck.
subtasks: Drive the tractor to the truck.
Lift the hay bale using the loader.
Transfer the hay bale into the truck bed.

tasks.task: Secure the hay in the truck.
subtasks: Distribute the hay in the bed.
Lock the tailgate to secure the load.

tasks.task: Exit the tractor and close the door.
subtasks: Step out of the driver's seat.
Close the tractor door.

tasks.task: Position the tractor for the next task.
subtasks: Manoeuvre the tractor to a suitable area.
Ensure the safety of the surrounding environment.
